directions: Combine Brussels sprouts and 2 tablespoons water in a medium microwave-safe bowl; cover. Microwave on 100% power (high) for 4 minutes, stirring halfway through. Immediately chill the Brussels sprouts by plunging into a bowl of ice water; drain well. Remove any excess moisture from the Brussels sprouts by using a salad spinner or place Brussels sprouts in a colander and use paper towels to absorb the excess moisture.

Combine Brussels sprouts and apple in a large bowl. Pour Honey Yogurt Dressing (see below) over Brussels sprouts mixture; toss gently to coat. Add bacon; toss gently to combine. Cover and chill for 2 to 24 hours. Just before serving, gently stir in almonds.
Honey Yogurt Dressing: Stir together VOSKOS(R) Nonfat Honey Greek Yogurt, cider vinegar, and salt in a bowl. Chill up to 24 hours.
ingredients: 1 (5.3 ounce) container VOSKOS® Nonfat Honey Greek Yogurt
title: Brussels Sprouts Slaw with Honey Yogurt Dressing
